meanings.definition: The act of holding a conference or meeting using video technology.
meanings.sent1: We used videoconferencing to discuss the project with our team.
meanings.sent2: Videoconferencing has become a popular way to connect with colleagues remotely.
meanings.sent3: During the videoconferencing, we accidentally switched backgrounds and had a virtual beach meeting.
meanings.sent4: The magic of videoconferencing transformed our separate rooms into a shared virtual boardroom.
meanings.sent5: The clarity of the videoconferencing made it feel like we were all in the same room.

meanings.definition: A method of communication that allows individuals in different locations to see and hear each other in real time.
meanings.sent1: My grandparents love using videoconferencing to chat with us across the country.
meanings.sent2: Videoconferencing apps make it easy for friends to catch up face-to-face from anywhere.
meanings.sent3: We had a videoconferencing party where everyone tried to wear funny hats on screen.
meanings.sent4: Through videoconferencing, we bridged the distance between us with virtual hugs and high-fives.
meanings.sent5: The power of videoconferencing brought us together despite being miles apart.
